title: Hiring Project Management Expert w/ Prev. Experience [FULL-TIME]
job_overview:
Are you interested in working from home in a positive environment with a scalable salary based on your performance? Then keep reading.

We are looking for an experienced project management specialist to join our team. You will be responsible for projects organization & listening all client calls to see if we have missed any tasks and organize them for the client delivery team. 

What we are looking for:
Some great soft skills - fun, likable, and detail-oriented.
You have at least 2 years of actual marketing experience in digital companies.
You are deeply interested in marketing and you are looking for a long-term job & career.
You are curious and hungry to learn and improve yourself.
Being able to communicate with clients in English.
You're not afraid to criticize and receive criticism. We appreciate honesty from all sides.
You're comfortable working autonomously.
Coachable, with an understanding that mentorship is an integral key to success.
Ability to analyse large data sets, create dashboards, and generate actionable insights.
Google Analytics - Ability to use most of the reports, analyse all key website data.
Shopify - Ability to use most of the reports, analyse all key store data.
Skilled in Clickup.com or equivalent project management software.
Familiarity with analyzing financial statements, especially income statements / P&Ls.
Strong analytical, quantitative, and problem-solving skills; ability to analyze raw data, draw conclusions, and develop actionable recommendations
Ability to organize and work in a fast-paced environment in order to prioritize and manage multiple projects at once.
Passion for learning about marketing, psychology, sales, and copywriting.
Understanding and working knowledge of marketing funnels, remarketing strategies and customer journey

What’s in it for you?
20 days paid off time (not including holidays).
Remote first business.
Scalable salary based on your performance.

Olifant Digital is a performance marketing agency that works exclusively with e-commerce brands. Unlike other agencies, we guarantee results, have happy clients, and work in a positive environment.

We foster a playful and collaborative atmosphere where creativity thrives. Our processes are minimal, systems simple, and communication casual. As a remote company, we hire talented people and offer above-market salaries.

Company culture:

Customer Obsession — Always do what is best for the customer, even if it takes more time or it's not scalable. Always put yourself in the shoes of the customer and do the ABSOLUTE best to deliver EXCEPTIONAL results.

Ownership — Think long term and don’t sacrifice long-term value for short-term results. Act on behalf of the entire company. Everyone in our team takes full responsibility of the outcomes, so we can take pride in the results.

Exceptional Communication — We are super proactive with fast and transparent communication. Speed is king.

Hire and Develop The Best Team — We always strive to find the best people for every position in our company. By working with exceptional talent, we are able to deliver outstanding results.

Independence — After speaking about shared values, here’s one that breaks away: Independence. We encourage independent thought and original thinking. Since day one, we’ve always done things our way. We don’t look to the industry or competitors for the way forward.

Unmatched Excellence — Our team has relentlessly high standards. We continually raise the bar and drive our team to deliver the highest-quality services possible for our clients.

We're looking for an amazing positive person with experience to be a part of our growing team and work with us for years ahead.

The stars don’t align like this very often — Join us!
